source.label: Info for those with normal blood pressure

cards.summary: Consider obtaining additional blood pressure measurements
cards.detail: You had a high blood pressure reading recently.  We do not have enough blood pressure measurements to provide a full picture of your health.  Getting a full set of blood pressures will help us provide the best care.  We consider a full set to be more than 4 in-office measurements, 6 home measurements, or 24 hours of ambulatory monitoring.
